resources.string: Welcome to the GWDG Wi-Fi Tool. This app will guide you through the process of setting up eduroam on your device.

In order to give a user feedback, if the connection to the eduroam network was successful, this app needs location permissions due to Android restrictions. Please grant the required permissions in the following dialog.

Additionally this app can delete your old eduroam config on Android 9 and below, if you grant location permissions. If you deny the location permission, the app will take you to the Wi-Fi settings so that you can delete old configurations by yourself.

Due to additional Android 10 restrictions, this app can not delete old eduroam configurations. If you have any old eduroam connections, please use the following popup to open the Wi-Fi settings and delete them.
The eduroam network has successfully been added to Wi-Fi networks.
The eduroam network could not be added to Wi-Fi networks. Please check for existing eduroam connections and restart app.
The connection could not be checked due to missing location permissions. Please check status in Android Wi-Fi settings.
Trying to establish connection. Please wait.
Could not establish connection to eduroam network. Please check eduroam availability and entered data.

A notification should appear and ask if eduroam should be added to Wi-Fi networks. After confirming, Android will decide when the eduroam connection is the best choice. To force an eduroam connection, please remove the current connected Wi-Fi network.
Please do not uninstall this application, as this will also remove the configured networks due to Android restrictions. You can close this app now.
Welcome to the GWDG Wi-Fi Tool
Open wifi settings to remove old eduroam?
Could not retrieve list of organizations. Please check internet connection and restart application.
